name: Hit the Roots Jacques !
description:
The incredible story of the amazing Jacques, when he was just a little kid and before he became the famous lumberjack we all know

Defeat the evil tree by destroying its evil crystals that pop out of the ground and avoid the traps it will cast at you !

Its roots will keep on growing, take care to cut them down once in a while to avoid getting blocked.

Made with love during the Global Game Jam 2023 at Strasbourg, by :

Timothée Lestradet - Art
Guillaume Grosshenny - Code
Vivien Pfrimmer - Code
Antoine Latour - Code
Antoine Schmoll - Art
Thomas Frick - Art
Alexandre Lefebvre - Sound and Music
